Welcome to the official blog for the Somali Fishery Stock Assessment Training program!

We are excited to launch this space to share updates, insights, and resources related to our training efforts. Our goal is to build capacity for sustainable fishery management in Somalia, and this blog will be a key part of our communication.

## What to Expect

In the coming weeks and months, we will be posting:

-   Updates on training modules and schedules.
-   Summaries of key concepts in stock assessment.
-   Success stories from our participants.
-   Helpful resources and links.

Stay tuned for more content!
